upperBoundMethods

Class DeltaHedgingUpperBound

  • java.lang.Object
    • upperBoundMethods.AbstractUpperBoundEstimation
      • upperBoundMethods.DeltaHedgingUpperBound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface

    public class DeltaHedgingUpperBound
extends AbstractUpperBoundEstimation
    Implements the upper bound estimation using AAD delta estimations as proposed by Joshi and Tang 2014
    Author:
    Lennart Quante

      • calculateMartingaleApproximation

        protected double calculateMartingaleApproximation(int evaluationPeriod,
                                                  net.finmath.montecarlo.interestrate.LIBORModelMonteCarloSimulationModel model,
                                                  net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable[] cacheUnderlying,
                                                  net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable[] cacheOptionValues,
                                                  net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable[] triggerValues)
                                           throws net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
        Description copied from class: AbstractUpperBoundEstimation
        This method needs to be specified to estimate the martingale component of the upper bound estimation using the following parameters:
        Specified by:
        calculateMartingaleApproximation in class AbstractUpperBoundEstimation
        Parameters:
        evaluationPeriod - period of the evaluation time in the model time discretization
        model - the LIBORModelMonteCarloSimulationModel to be used
        cacheUnderlying - The cached exercise values from the lower bound method.
        cacheOptionValues - The cached option values from the lower bound method.
        triggerValues - The cached trigger values from the lower bound method.
        Returns:
        The Monte Carlo estimate of the martingale component, as a double.
        Throws:
        net.finmath.exception.CalculationException

      • deltaMartingaleApproximation

        private java.util.ArrayList<net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable> deltaMartingaleApproximation(double evaluationTime,
                                                                                                int numberOfFixingDates)
                                                                                         throws net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
        Method to approximate the martingale process based on delta approximations from AAD.
        Parameters:
        evaluationTime - The time at which the martingale should be evaluated (i.e. discounted to)
        numberOfFixingDates - The number of periods for which the martingale process needs to be approximated.
        Returns:
        An array list with all estimated martingale RandomVariables
        Throws:
        net.finmath.exception.CalculationException

      • getDeltas

        private net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable[] getDeltas(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable> gradient,
                                                          double modelTime)
                                                   throws net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
        Method to estimate the relevant deltas for the martingale approximation.
        Parameters:
        gradient - The already calculated gradient map.
        modelTimeIndex - The model time index for which the deltas should be calculated
        Returns:
        The delta approximation as a RandomVariable.
        Throws:
        net.finmath.exception.CalculationException

      • getRegressionBasisFunctionsBinning

        private java.util.ArrayList<net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable> getRegressionBasisFunctionsBinning(net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable underlying,
                                                                                                      net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable exerciseIndicator)
        Method to provide basis functions for delta approximation using binning.
        Parameters:
        underlying - The underlying value of the deltas.
        exerciseIndicator - The exercise indicator of the option.
        Returns:
        The basis functions to estimate the conditional expectation of the deltas.
